archimate:Requirement.name: SC-5(2): Denial-of-service Protection | Capacity, Bandwidth, and Redundancy
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Manage capacity, bandwidth, or other redundancy to limit the effects of information flooding denial-of-service attacks.

properties.value: Managing capacity ensures that sufficient capacity is available to counter flooding attacks. Managing capacity includes establishing selected usage priorities, quotas, partitioning, or load balancing.
